articles.title: Signal Achievements Made in Metal Industry
articles.content:
Signal Achievements Made in Metal Industry
 Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- Many successes were reported from the field of metal industry in the DPRK this year. 
					 The total industrial output value of the Ministry of Metal Industry increased 30 percent as of the end of November as compared with that in the corresponding period of last year. 
					
					 The production of pig iron swelled 2.4 times, that of steel 1.3 times, that of rolled steel 1.6 times and that of iron ore 1.6 times which are main indexes. 
					
					 Many enterprises including the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex and the Jaeryong and Unryul Mines honored their yearly plans before October 10.  
					
					 The workers of the complex completely succeeded in rounding off the iron-making method at the blast furnace based on Juche iron and established a new production system of Juche iron. 
					
					 The production of pig iron went up 2.5 times, that of steel 4.2 times and that of rolled steel 6.7 times over those last year at the complex. 
					
					 The workers of the Chollima Steel Complex built UHP electric arc furnace No.2 capable of ensuring steel production by use of Juche iron in a matter of five months. 
					
					 They completed the projects to build a base for the production of multi-element alloy steel and technologically update revolving furnace No. 3 at the Posan Iron Works and set up a 550 cubic meter oxygen plant, thus consolidating their material and technical foundation and boosting production. 
					
					 Officials and miners of the Jaeryong Mine fulfilled their yearly plan for the production of iron ore on September 30 through a collective innovation drive. 
					
					 The miners of the Musan Mining Complex built a new large crushing plant and installed a belt conveyer line extending thousands of meters, more than quadrupling the earth removing capacity and increasing its ore production 1.5 times. 
					
					 The workers of the Unryul Mine brought about a boost in the iron ore production with the same vim and vigor with which they honored their yearly plan before the October holiday. 
					
					 The workers of the Ryongwon and Phyongsan mines, the Kangnam Dolomite Mine and the Jaeryong Mining Equipment Parts Plant, too, carried out their yearly quotas before the birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea through a drive for increased production.

articles.title: New Feature Film Produced
articles.content:
New Feature Film Produced
 Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- The Korean Film Studio recently produced feature film "Wheel of Happiness".
					 The film truthfully deals with the life of a woman architectural designer who creditably fulfils her social duty and responsibility as required by the trend of the times in which a dynamic drive for building a thriving nation is under way.
					
					 Through the portrayal of the heroine of the film it urges the women in the DPRK to energetically push one of the two wheels of the revolutionary chariot of Songun true to the leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Central Zoo Fauna Grows Larger
articles.content:
Central Zoo Fauna Grows Larger
 Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- The Central Zoo in Pyongyang has embraced more rare animals.
					According to Pak Yong Hui, an official of the zoo, Genral Secretary Kim Jong Il has sent animals of over 70 kinds, including Korean tiger, to the zoo this year for public entertainment.
					
					 Several dozen animals of some ten kinds sent to Kim Jong Il from other countries as gifts also joined the zoo.
					
					 Among the newcomers are African lions, dromedaries, barbary sheep, black bucks and dogs of Tibet breed.
					
					 This year animals of more than 120 kinds, including horses of Mongolian breed, have multiplied into hundreds in the zoo.
					
					 The zoo is now concentrating on providing the animals with better ecological environment suitable for the winter season.

articles.title: Rimyongsu Falls Turns into Ice Falls in Winter
articles.content:
Rimyongsu Falls Turns into Ice Falls in Winter
 Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- Rimyongsu Falls in Samjiyon County, Ryanggang Province, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, presents a fantastic scenery in the winter season.
					 Nearby trees are frosted by the spray of the waterfall and water streams come out from between icicles of the ice-covered cliff.
					
					 The waterfall is 15 metres high and 27 metres wide.
					
					 Underground water gushes out through basalt cracks to consist of five main streams with many small streams going down between the five streams.
					
					 The water from the falls flows to the Rimyongsu Barrage.
					
					 The waterfall gives different seasonal views with azaleas in spring, thick foliage in summer and red leaves in autumn going well with the cascade, rocks and lake. 
					
					 Above the waterfall, registered as a natural product, is a cosy pavilion.

articles.title: Good Results Scored in International Tournaments
articles.content:
Good Results Scored in International Tournaments
 Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- Sportspersons of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have proved successful in international tournaments this year.
					 The DPRK men's football teams won the AFC Challenger Cup Tournament, the Asian U-16 Football Championship, the 4-nation Soccer Tournament in Qatar and the International Tournament for the Vietnam Football Association Cup.
					
					 The DPRK took the trophy and the prize of morality in the Asian U-19 Football Championship, with its player, Jong Il Gwan, named the best player.
					
					 The DPRK women's team also made a good job in the AFC Women's Asian Cup to earn a ticket for the 2011 Women's World Cup.
					
					 Many gold medals were garnered in shooting, weightlifting, boxing, judo and other international tournaments.
					
					 Jo Yong Chol finished first in the 50th World Shooting Championship of the International Shooting Sports Federation, Kim Un Guk in the World Weightlifting Championship, Yun Kum Ju in the World Women's Boxing Championship and the 5th Asian Women's Boxing Championship and An Kum Ae in the World Cup Women's Judo Tournament.  
					
					 Taekwon-Do players bagged many gold medals and trophies in the 5th Asian Taekwon-Do Championship, the 9th World Junior Taekwon-Do Championship and the 4th Veteran Taekwon-Do Championship, ranking first in team standings.
					
					 The DPRK also scored good results in the 16th Asian Games, the 14th International Boxing Masters Championship, the First Youth Olympic Games, the Asian Junior Judo Championship, the 12th Asian Junior Weightlifting Championship, the International Free Flying Aero Model Contest for Mongolian Cup and other international tournaments.

articles.title: S. Korea's Cooperation with Outsiders in Anti-DPRK Moves Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korea's Cooperation with Outsiders in Anti-DPRK Moves Flailed
 Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the puppet minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade of south Korea implored the U.S. secretary of State and the foreign minister of Japan to take joint counteractions to curb additional provocation and make close cooperation, and signed a 10-point "statement" while talking about "north's provocation" and the like.
					 The puppet warmongers induced the chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff of the U.S. on a visit to south Korea to approve "its scenario for exercising the right to self-defense" which calls for attacking the DPRK by "mobilizing all fighters and warship artillery pieces in case of additional provocation." They, at the same time, agreed with him to stage another large-scale south Korea-U.S. joint military exercise.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary in this connection: 
					
					 The above-said dangerous scenario to launch a war in league with the U.S. is nothing but treachery escalating the tension between the north and the south and bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean Peninsula as it is the height of sycophancy and treachery. 
					
					 The south Korean conservative group is busy making uproar over someone's "provocation" while clinging to foreign forces' coattail. This is, however, nothing but shameless hypocrisy to mislead the domestic and foreign public opinion.
					
					 It is none other than the puppet forces that have staged ceaseless DPRK-targeted war exercises in the West Sea of Korea in which both sides stand in acute confrontation and sparked off confrontation and clashes in the said waters while crying out for "preserving the northern limit line," an illegal one. The recent shelling into the territorial waters of the DPRK side around Yonphyong Island was part of those provocations. It was a legitimate self-defensive measure for the DPRK to have retaliated against the shelling.
					
					 It is outside forces which will fish in troubled waters when the tension escalates and confrontation gets acute on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					  It is foreign forces that seek strategic interests on the Korean Peninsula. The greater benefit they get from the escalated tension there, the bigger harm they will do to the Korean nation. Then it will suffer from the north-south confrontation and a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the south Korean conservative group makes no scruple of escalating cooperation with outside forces in utter disregard of the destiny and interests of the Korean nation, prompted by its criminal design to stifle fellow countrymen.
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to stop running amuck, pondering over the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by their anti-DPRK cooperation with outsiders.

articles.title: Songun Politics of WPK Lauded
articles.content:
Songun Politics of WPK Lauded
 Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- The Songun politics pursued by the Workers' Party of Korea is the steadfast policy for independence against imperialism as it provides a sure guarantee for defending the dignity and sovereignty of the nation from foreign forces' aggression moves and achieving victory in the cause of independent reunification in reliance on the invincible revolutionary armed forces. It also serves as a treasured sword for reliably protecting peace on the Korean Peninsula and security of the fellow countrymen.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday stresses this in a signed article.
					
					 The Songun politics represents pluck and grit whereby to carve out the nation's destiny in an independent way and the invincible might capable of meeting any high-handed practice and challenge of foreign forces, and that is why it serves as a banner for independently hewing out the destiny of the nation, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Peace does not come of its own accord. If one has a weak hand, there will be no other choice but to lament over it. This is a lesson the Korean people have keenly learnt through history and reality.
					
					 The banner of Songun should be upheld, above anything else, in order to foil the vicious aggression moves of war-like forces at home and abroad, protect peace on the Korean Peninsula and security of the nation and pave the way for peaceful reunification.
					
					 The banner of Songun represents the noble patriotic will to safeguard the security of the whole nation and the invincible might capable of checking the anti-DPRK war moves of bellicose forces at home and abroad.
					
					 It is thanks to the powerful Songun politics that a war has not broken out in the Korean Peninsula despite the vicious moves of the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers to ignite a war of aggression on the DPRK.
					
					 The present reality eloquently proves how just is the choice of the DPRK which has bolstered up its military capability for self-defence in every way under the uplifted banner of Songun.

articles.title: S. Korea to Stage Plan for Ground Joint Exercises
articles.content:
S. Korea to Stage Plan for Ground Joint Exercises
 Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- The "Metropolitan Mechanized Infantry Division" of the puppet ground force announced on Dec. 11 that it would stage ground joint exercises in the areas of Namyangju and Kaphyong of Kyonggi Province from Dec. 14 to 16, according to Yonhap News of south Korea. 
					 The warmongers are contemplating hurling large forces and public servants and police into the planned war exercises, vociferating about the "infiltration" of someone and "provocation of limited war."
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula is getting tenser due to the ceaseless exercises being staged by the Lee Myung Bak puppet warmongers for a war of aggression against the DPRK, while being hell-bent on the confrontation with fellow countrymen.

articles.title: S. Korea's Moves to Escalate Military Confrontation under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korea's Moves to Escalate Military Confrontation under Fire
 Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- At least 30 women's organizations of south Korea such as the Federation of Women's Organizations and the Women's Society for Achieving Peace at a press conference in Seoul on Dec. 9 denounced the puppet authorities for their moves to escalate the military confrontation increasing the tension on the Korean Peninsula.
					 At the conference they accused the authorities of staging again a shelling drill, increasing the danger of war in the wake of the largest-ever combine maneuvers in the West Sea with the U.S. following the Yonphyong Island shelling incident. 
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula is being strained to an extreme pitch of tension but the authorities are working hard to massively beef up their armed forces in waters of the West Sea of Korea and increase military spending, they noted, and continued:
					
					 What the women desire is not war but peace. The authorities should stop their reckless moves to escalate the military confrontation and opt for dialogue with the DPRK.
					
					 They stressed that the women will continue to stage the actions for achieving peace on the peninsula against the moves of the authorities to ignite a war.

articles.title: Fascists of S. Korea Sentence University Professor to Prison Terms
articles.content:
Fascists of S. Korea Sentence University Professor to Prison Terms
 Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Supreme Court sentenced Honorary Professor Kang Jong Gu of Tongguk National University to two years in prison and suspension of qualification and three years in stay of execution on charge of the violation of the ill-famed "National Security Law" on Dec. 9.
					 The puppet Supreme Court at a trial held that day took the above-said action against him on charges that he visited Pyongyang in August 2001 and wrote in the visitor's book in Mangyongdae the slogan "Let's achieve the cause of reunification by inheriting the spirit of Mangyongdae" and posted on the internet articles encouraging and praising the north.

articles.title: Nigerian Juche Idea Study Organization Holds Annual Meeting
articles.content:
Nigerian Juche Idea Study Organization Holds Annual Meeting 
 Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea took place in Abuja on Dec. 7.
					 The meeting reviewed this year's work of the organization and discussed its program for running Juche idea study groups 2011.
					
					 It stressed that activity in 2011 is of great importance in significantly commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, founder of the Juche idea, and decided to hold a joint seminar and other events and expand Juche idea study groups in different parts of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised in Colombia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised in Colombia
Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- The Group for the Study of the Juche Idea "Kanggye" of Colombia issued a bulletin titled "Brilliant Commander Kim Jong Il" on Dec. 4 on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 The bulletin in its preface said that the last nearly 20 years since Kim Jong Il's assumption of the KPA supreme commandership was a period in which his personality as brilliant commander was fully demonstrated.
					
					 In an article subtitled "Unique Mode of Leadership over Army" the bulletin said that the most important feature in his mode of leadership over the army is energetic inspection.
					
					 His ceaseless inspection of units helps the KPA grow stronger as an invincible army, it said.
					
					 In an article subtitled "With Matchless Pluck and Grit" the bulletin praised Kim Jong Il as the brilliant commander who brings enemies to their knees with his matchless pluck and grit without firing a single shot.
					
					 It stressed that the army and people of the DPRK led by Kim Jong Il would as ever be crowned with victory.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Nigeria 
 Pyongyang, December 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was brought out in booklet by the N. K. Publishing House in Enugu of Nigeria.
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is a powerful political mode in the present era which inherited and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of attaching importance to the army and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode which most correctly reflected the requirements of the times and the revolution. Also expounded in it are the validity and advantages of the Songun politics and its great vitality. 
					
					 Its releasing ceremony took place on Dec. 5.

articles.title: CNCDP condena la conspiracion para desatar la guerra contra la RPDC
articles.content:
CNCDP condena la conspiracion para desatar la guerra contra la RPDC
 Pyongyang, 13 de diciembre (ATCC) -- En su declaracion publicada el dia 11, el portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz (CNCDP) condeno la conspiracion para la guerra entre los imperialistas yanquis y los belicistas surcoreanos equiparandola con la declaracion de que desatarian la guerra total mediante la escalada de conflictos armados.
					  El pasado dia 8, tuvo lugar en Seul la reunion de los presidentes de la Junta de los Jefes de Estado Mayor Sur de Corea-Estados Unidos, comienza la nota y prosigue:
					
					En esa ocasion, los imperialistas norteamericanos y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos realizaron el muy peligroso debate de guerra para atacar militarmente juntos a la RPDC bajo el pretexto de "disuadir la provocacion" de alguien.
					
					  En particular, EE.UU. aprobo abiertamente las pretensiones de los titeres surcoreanos de atacar a la RPDC movilizando todos los aviones, buques de guerra y otros medios sin comprometerse a las existentes "reglas de combate" bajo el rotulo de "derecho a la autodefensa".
					
					Igualmente, anuncio que examinaria el proyecto de apoyar al Sur de Corea durante el eventual conflicto armado intercoreano suministrandole las "informaciones del Norte de Corea" y hasta los aviones "F-22 Raptor" conocidos como "mejores cazas del mundo".
					
					  Esto demuestra que EE.UU. se une totalmente a la campana guerrerista de los titeres surcoreanos contra la RPDC quitandose la mascara de hipocrita.
					
					  Ahora, los belicistas titeres surcoreanos, que fueron castigados por el Ejercito Popular de Corea debido a su imprudente provocacion militar, actuan sin juicio hablando de "represalia" y "castigo merecido".
					
					  Esta locura militar cuenta con el estimulo de EE.UU. que envia con urgencia a su cabecilla militar a Seul, refuerza sus tropas agresoras, intensifica el ejercicio de guerra y completa el "plan del combate local".
					
					  Si el ejercito titere surcoreano abre fuego contra la RPDC movilizando generalmente los aviones, buques de guerra y misiles y EE.UU. se suma con sus equipos belicos ultramodernos, esto sera la guerra total pasando los limites de combate local.
					
					  En ese sentido, la reunion arriba referida revela claramente que el incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan" y el de canonazos en la isla Yonphyong, inventados por la banda de titeres surcoreanos y los belicistas norteamericanos, persiguieron la finalidad de desatar la guerra total.
					
					  Es muy ridiculo que los titeres surcoreanos, que no son mas que lacayos y colonos a cargo de ejecutar la guerra pretendida por EE.UU., hablaran del supuesto "derecho a la autodefensa". Esta sofisteria no tiene otro objetivo que disimular sus provocaciones militares y campana guerrerista.
					
					  Debido a la imprudente provocacion de EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana se acerca a la fase de guerra total.
					
					  La situacion de ahora hace recordar el tiempo en visperas de la pasada guerra coreana cuando EE.UU. instigaba a los titeres surcoreanos a agredir al Norte de Corea.
					
					  Si se vuelve a desatar la guerra total en el territorio patrio, esta guerra traspasara el marco de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  El ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC estan preparados para cualquier cosa, sea la escalada de conflictos armados o la guerra total.
					
					  La RPDC defendera honrosamente la dignidad y la seguridad de la nacion al destruir por completo el bastion de los provocadores y agresores castigandolos implacablemente.
					
					  Los belicistas surcoreanos y norteamericanos deben actuar con prudencia teniendo presente que la provocacion de guerra no les dara otro resultado que el arruinamiento de si mismos.

articles.title: Se aumentan animales raros en el Parque Zoologico Nacional
articles.content:
Se aumentan animales raros en el Parque Zoologico Nacional
Pyongyang, 13 de diciembre (ATCC) -- En estos dias, anidaron nuevos animales raros en el Parque Zoologico Nacional de Corea. 
					La funcionaria del Parque Zoologico Nacional, Pak Yong Hui (de 37 anos de edad), dando a conocer a los nuevos "familiares", dijo a la ATCC:
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien presta profunda atencion a la vida cultural y la educacion de los trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares, hizo enviar este ano mas de 70 especies de animales incluso el tigre de origen coreano.
					
					Entre ellos se ven decenas de animales de mas de 10 especies, obsequiados al Dirigente por varios paises del mundo. En particular, atraen a los clientes varios leones africanos, dromedarios que se llaman "barco de desiertos" y antilopes indios muy manosos. 
					
					Y el perro oriundo de Tibet de China habita por primera vez desde junio pasado en nuestro pais.
					
					Este ano hemos logrado un exito de aumentar en centenares el numero de los animales de mas de 120 especies incluso el caballo mongol cuidandolos de manera cientifica.
					
					Ahora hacemos ingentes esfuerzos por asegurar a los animales el habitat mas favorable a las condiciones invernales.

articles.title: Exitos deportivos de 2010
articles.content:
Exitos deportivos de 2010
Pyongyang, 13 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Los deportistas coreanos lograron este ano exitos alentadores en los eventos internacionales.
					Los futbolistas coreanos ocuparon el primer puesto en la Competencia por la Copa de Retadores de 2010 de la Confederacion Asiatica de Futbol, el Campeonato Asiatico de Futbol sub-16, el Torneo de Futbol de 4 Paises en Qatar y el Torneo Internacional por la Copa de la Asociacion de Futbol de Vietnam para 2010, respectivamente.
					
					Particularmente, recibio el premio de moral el once coreano, que conquisto la medalla de oro y la copa en el Campeonato Asiatico de Futbol sub-19 2010, y Jong Il Gwan fue seleccionado como mejor jugador.
					
					Tambien las futbolistas lograron notables resultados en el Campeonato de Futbol Femenino por la Copa Asiatica 2010 y obtuvieron asi el boleto a la Copa Mundial de la FIFA de 2011 (f).
					
					Surgieron muchos medallistas de oro tambien en otras disciplinas como el tiro, el levantamiento de pesas, el boxeo y el judo.
					
					Jo Yong Chol ocupo el primer lugar en el 50o Campeonato Mundial de Tiro de la Federacion Internacional de Deportes de Tiro; Kim Un Guk en el Campeonato Mundial de Levantamiento de Pesas de 2010; Yun Kum Ju en el Campeonato Mundial de Boxeo Femenino de 2010 y V Campeonato Asiatico de Boxeo Femenino; An Kum Ae en el Torneo de Judo Femenino por la Copa Mundial, respectivamente.
					
					Los taekwondoistas pusieron de manifiesto la inteligencia y talentos de la nacion coreana al encabezar la clasificacion general por paises conquistando muchas medallas de oro y trofeos en el V Campeonato Asiatico de Taekwondo, el IX Campeonato Mundial de Jovenes de Taekwondo, el IV Campeonato Mundial de Veteranos de Taekwondo.
					
					La bandera nacional de la RPDC fue izada igualmente en las astas de los 16o Juegos Asiaticos, el 14o Campeonato Internacional de Boxeadores Estelares, los 1o Juegos Olimpicos de Juniores, el Campeonato Asiatico de Judo de Juniores 2010, el XII Campeonato Asiatico de Levantamiento de Pesas de Juniores, etc.

articles.title: Se aumentan animales raros en el Parque Zoologico Nacional
articles.content:
Se aumentan animales raros en el Parque Zoologico Nacional
Pyongyang, 13 de diciembre (ATCC) -- En estos dias, anidaron nuevos animales raros en el Parque Zoologico Nacional de Corea. 
					La funcionaria del Parque Zoologico Nacional, Pak Yong Hui (de 37 anos de edad), dando a conocer a los nuevos "familiares", dijo a la ATCC:
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien presta profunda atencion a la vida cultural y la educacion de los trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares, hizo enviar este ano mas de 70 especies de animales incluso el tigre de origen coreano. 
					
					Entre ellos se ven decenas de animales de mas de 10 especies, obsequiados al Dirigente por varios paises del mundo. En particular, atraen a los clientes varios leones africanos, dromedarios que se llaman "barco de desiertos" y antilopes indios muy manosos. 
					
					Y el perro oriundo de Tibet de China habita por primera vez desde junio pasado en nuestro pais.
					
					Este ano hemos logrado un exito de aumentar en centenares el numero de los animales de mas de 120 especies incluso el caballo mongol cuidandolos de manera cientifica.
					
					Ahora hacemos ingentes esfuerzos por asegurar a los animales el habitat mas favorable a las condiciones invernales.
